Himalayan Rewards

#### Email Sign Up

For Deals, Coupons etc

[Email Sign Up](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant-niles/marketing-signup)

For location pickup

[Location Pick up](https://order.toasttab.com/online/locations/6562c619-ddb3-41c4-b098-f90d8c807e9e/default)

#### Loyalty Sign Up

Earn **1 point** for every **$ 1** spent  
**$ 5** discount for every **100** points  

Join Himalayan Restaurant Rewards and start earning delicious rewards!

[Loyalty Sign Up](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant-niles/rewardsSignup)

#### e-Gift Card

Get the e-Gift cards and gift to your favourite ones.

[Purchase](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant-niles/giftcards)

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/media/logo.jpg)

Himalayan Restaurant Family style Nepalese & North Indian Cusinise serving Chicago South Loop and Niles Northshore since 1993. Indian & Nepali Cuisine Family and Kid friendly homestyle cooking Nepali & Indian Restaurant

### Follow us
